but can freeze an enemy for a turn. \c[27]\bpdamage[225]%\c[0] MAT rate.
name: Ice I
note:
<Boost Damage>

<action copy: skill:7>

description:
The most basic of lightning-element attacks. It still packs quite a punch,
though. Damages 1 extra enemy. \c[27]\bpdamage[275]%\c[0] MAT rate.
name: Lightning I
note:
<Boost Damage>

<setup action>
motion chant: user
wait: 30
motion spell: user
</setup action>

<whole action>
</whole action>

<target action>
action animation
wait: 5
action effect
wait: 5
</target action>

<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = a.mat * 2.75 - b.mdf * 2;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier *= 0.5;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Fix for #9
if (user.isEnemy()) {
  id = Math.floor(Math.random() * foes.aliveMembers().length);
  target = foes.aliveMembers()[id];
}
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 1
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

description:
Reveals all enemy weaknesses. Allows you to
see enemy HP for the duration of the battle.
name: Analyze
note:
<Require = 0 BP>
<Analyze Weakness: 999>

<Before Eval>
if (target.barrierPoints() > 0) {
  var text = '\\c[4]' + target.name() + '\\c[0]: ' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.hp) + '\\c[13]+(' + target.barrierPoints() + ')\\c[0]/' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.mhp);
} else {
  var text = '\\c[4]' + target.name() + '\\c[0]: ' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.hp) + '/' + Yanfly.Util.toGroup(target.mhp);
}
$gameMessage.add(text);
BattleManager.addText("Analysis successful!", 0);
target._analyzed = true;
SceneManager._scene.children.find(a => a instanceof Spriteset_Battle).children.find(b => b.children.some(c => c instanceof Window_VisualHPGauge)).children.find(d => d._battler == target).refresh();
</Before Eval>

description:
A much stronger lightning attack, guaranteed to fry an enemy and even sometimes
paralyze them. Damages 2 extra enemies. \c[27]\bpdamage[425]%\c[0] MAT rate.
name: Lightning II
note:
<Boost Damage>

<Damage Formula>
// Set the chain multiplier to a value if it doesn't exist.
this._chainmultiplier = this._chainmultiplier || 1.0;
// This is the damage formula.
value = a.mat * 4.25 - b.mdf * 2;
// Apply the chain multiplier to the damage formula.
value *= this._chainmultiplier;
// Reduce the chain multiplier per target.
this._chainmultiplier *= 0.5;
</Damage Formula>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Fix for #9
if (user.isEnemy()) {
  id = Math.floor(Math.random() * foes.aliveMembers().length);
  target = foes.aliveMembers()[id];
}
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// Remove the target from the group of candidates.
members.splice(members.indexOf(target), 1);
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 2
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
    // Remove the member as a viable candidate.
    members.splice(members.indexOf(member), 1);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>

<Custom Target Eval>
// Adds the selected target to the target list.
targets.push(target);
// Grab the group of alive foes as candidates.
var members = foes.aliveMembers();
// This is the number of extra targets to select with Chain Lightning.
var extraTargets = 1 + (2 * user.useBP());
// Loop the extra targets.
while (extraTargets--) {
  // Grab a random foe from the alive foes.
  var member = members[Math.floor(Math.random() * members.length)];
  // Check to see if the member exists.
  if (member) {
    // Add the member to the group of targets.
    targets.push(member);
  }
}
</Custom Target Eval>
